column2: "Wɔdze nguambaa fi Sela nam sar do afamu akɛma
column3: asaase no do hwɛdofo no wɔ Zion babaa bepɔw no do."

column4: dɛm na Moab mbabaa bɛyɛ wɔ Arnon esutwae."

column3: bua atsɛn; yɛ wo nwinwin dɛ anadwe wɔ ewiaber ketee: fa hɔn a wɔapam hɔn huntsa; mma nnkyerɛ ɔkobɔfo do kwan."

column2: "Ma Moab atokyemfo no ntsena wo nkyɛn; yɛ huntsabea ma hɔn wɔ ɔsɛɛfo no enyim. Sɛ ɔpempensifo no fi hɔ na ɔsɛɛ bɔ adze
column3: na ahyɛdofo sa wɔ asaase no do a
column5: "nna wobetsim ahengua bi wɔ mbɔbɔrhu mu
column6: na obi atsena do wɔ nokwar mu wɔ David ntamadan mu nyia obu atsɛn

column2: "Yɛatse Moab horan a ɔahoran dodow no nka; n'ahopɔw
column4: na n'ebufuw; naaso n'ahohyehyɛ yɛ gyan."

column3: obiara ntwa ewuo mma Moab: Kir-hareset esikyireamba tatar ntsi hom bɛka mmɔn dɛ wɔabobɔ hom pasaa."
na Sibma wenyindua no so; amanaman ewuranom no ebubu n'abaw fɛɛfɛw no; ɔtserɛw kodu Jazer mpo
column5: na okotwaa mu wɔ po do."

column3: Sibma wenyindua: medze me nyinsuwa bogugu wo do nsu
column5: na Eleale: wo nduaba nye wo twaber do na ɔko mu nkekamu no abɔhwe."

column3: na dɛw no efi nhabamber no mu; na adwontow biara nnyi wenyin nture no mu anaa ehurusi dede biara nnkɛba hɔ: na okyifo biara nnkekyi wenyin wɔ nsakyimona mu; mama esikyireambatsew dede abɔ adze."

column2: "Iyi ntsi me kra si nkrum dɛ sanku ndze wɔ Moab ho
column3: na m'akoma so wɔ Kir-heres ho."

column5: na ɔba no krɔnkrɔnbea hɔ beyi mpaa a

column2: "Iyi nye asɛm a EWURADZE kae wɔ Moab ho aber a ɔabɛsen."

column5: na Moab nye ne nyimpadodow pii no nyinara hɔn enyimnyam bɛyɛ gyan; na hɔn a wɔbɛka no bɛyɛ ketseabaa a wonnyi ahom biara."
